title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Time Loop
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: An obsessive planner trapped in a time loop keeps dying at the same Prague hostel night after night, each attempt to escape the loop ending in a new and creative death until she finally breaks - and discovers that dying was always the only way out.

death_teaser: Same night. Different death. Every time.
